idea:
We are India's first and only "stone paper" printing and packaging company,

We provide stone paper which is sustainable and ecofriendly alternative to the conventional pulp paper in many applications form commercial printing to packaging.
name: STONE PAPER PRINTING AND PACKAGING INDIA LLP

idea:
HealthismPlus is a growing health and wellness service provider aggregator with a Pan India presence. We have a network of pharmacies, pathology labs, diagnostic centers, doctors, dentists, salons, spas, yoga centers and more that provide quality and affordable services to our customers.

Customers can avail our services by buying yearly subscription plans for them and their families. We have also tied up with some leading corporate houses who offer our subscriptions to their employees as a part of their employee benefits programs. Currently we are helping 55,000 happy families lead a healthy life at an affordable cost.
name: HEALTHISMPLUS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: SunnySynergy Solutions (SSS) is the firm investigating detailed analysis or synthesis of complex system operations and providing solutions for performance enhancement. Having specialization in handling large complex systems, SS can replicate the physical systems into a simulations environment to get in-depth knowledge of the existing operating scenarios to zero down the key factors affecting the performance. For large power grids using PMU or synchrophasor data, the Wide-area measurement, protection, and control (WAMPAC) schemes can be developed and validated. The data can be used to form data-driven models for better prediction and estimation for various system parameters using machine learning algorithms. This can be further used for even system security for the future grid operation where renewable integration would lead to problems associated with bi-directional power flow, keeping account for both ends. USP of our project is to implement the causality aspect in inferencing for the cyber-physical system.
name: SunnySynergy Solutions (SSS)

idea: KRED Farms is a private limited business that was founded on August 31, 2021. Vision for the company is to Develop accessible technology which serves the community . KRED Farms focuses primarily on developing efficient farming setups for optimal production in both agricultural and non-agricultural lands and areas. The company's major goals are to create high quality agricultural produce, agriculture-related products and services by employing contemporary agricultural practices, which will increase the efficiency and quality of harvested products while also bringing about positive change in the sector and especially transforming the lives of the farmers . Our main focus will be on activities such as hydroponic farming, contract farming, and farm management, apart from this company is planning to expand by providing customers with a portable setup that can be utilised to produce fresh vegetables in the comfort of their own homes.
name: KRED FARMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ASLINATURAL FOODS LLP provides its customers with high-quality, products such as wood-pressed oils, desi ghee, raw honey, stone-ground spices, and superfood seeds. we understand the problems farmers face trying to promote their enterprise and provide them with a platform to market their products to conscious consumers who value health, nutrition, and sustainability.

Adding value to agriculture in India, we devise and leverage data-backed solutions to advance farming and deliver high-quality products. Our unique solutions are completely traceable, and consumers can visualize the journey of the products purchased by scanning the unique QR code provided on each product. We are determined to empower Indian farmers by furthering the age-old Ayurvedic traditional processing methods and providing them with a transparent platform where they are assured of the value of their products and the earnings they make.
name: ASLINATURAL FOODS LLP

idea: Shalasha Distribution is setting up a pan India distribution network for consumer goods companies. It aims to provide instant retail market access to the associated companies .It will use its sales team for market development activities for these brands.
name: SHALASHA DISTRIBUTION LLP
